questions.question: For most economical rectangular section of a channel, the depth is kept
When water flows over a rectangular suppressed weir, the negative pressure created beneath the nappe
A notch is a device used to measure

answers.a: rate of change of fluid through any type of channels
answers.b: rate of change of fluid through small channels
answers.c: rate of change of fluid through large channels

questions.question: The sheet of liquid flowing over a notch is known as
For a suppressed rectangular weir an arrangement for aeration of nappe is necessary ______.

answers.b: To prevent submergence of the weir
answers.c: To have the highest value of C<sub>d</sub>
answers.d: To have a constant head discharge relationship which is independent of time
